mapper.insert: insert into block_rule ( farm_id, batch_no, area, spec, unit_price, `number`, `type`, description, lease_unit, max_lease, create_time, validity_begin, validity_end, update_time ) values ( #{farmId}, #{batchNo}, #{area}, #{spec}, #{unitPrice}, #{number}, #{type}, #{description}, #{leaseUnit}, #{maxLease}, #{createTime}, #{validityBegin}, #{validityEnd}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: select farm_id, batch_no, spec, unit_price, `number`, `type`, description, lease_unit, max_lease, create_time, validity_begin, validity_end, update_time, (select count(*) from block_detail where `status` = 1) as has_lease from block_rule where farm_id = #{id} and NOW() BETWEEN validity_begin and validity_end
